content.new: The current Polaris model is missing the F/N/R button for the VRC
content.old:
The current Polaris model is missing the F/N/R button and key-switch.

If those are intended to be used in the VRC they need to be added.

title.old: Polaris button and key-switch interface missing

message.raw: Increasing to critical and renaming ticket as the F/N/R switch will be simulated for the VRC according to [DRC forum](https://www.theroboticschallenge.org/forum/default.aspx?Function_fst=ViewThread&ThreadID_fin=210)
message.html: Increasing to critical and renaming ticket as the F/N/R switch will be simulated for the VRC according to DRC forum
